mapper.select: SELECT ccd.`name` as ccdname ,ccd.`address` as ccdaddress ,cci.`carer`, cci.`carerPhone`,dcb.`carBrandName` as dcbcarbrandname, deb.`engineBrandName` as debenginebrandname , cci.`engineNumber`,ccd.`number` as ccdnumber , dcb.`id` as dcbid , deb.`id` as debid FROM `client_carinfo` AS cci STRAIGHT_JOIN `client_clientdata` AS ccd ON cci.`clientId` = ccd.`number` STRAIGHT_JOIN `data_carbrand` AS dcb ON cci.`carBrandId` = dcb.`id` STRAIGHT_JOIN `data_engine_brand` AS deb ON cci.`engineId` = deb.`id` WHERE cci.`carNumber` = #{carNumber}

SELECT ca.`id` , ca.`carNumber` ,ca.`frameNumber` , ca.`carId`, dc.`carBrandName` as dccarbrandname , ca.`engineNumber`, deb.`engineBrandName` as debenginebrandname , cc.`name` as ccname ,ca.`carer`, cc.`phone` as ccphone , cc.`number` as ccnumber ,deb.`id` as debid , dc.`id` as dcid FROM `client_carinfo` AS ca STRAIGHT_JOIN `client_clientdata` AS cc ON ca.`clientId` = cc.`number` STRAIGHT_JOIN `data_engine_brand` AS deb ON ca.`engineId` = deb.`id` STRAIGHT_JOIN `data_carbrand` AS dc ON ca.`carBrandId` = dc.`id` WHERE ca.`carNumber` = #{carnumber}

SELECT ca.`id` ,ca.`carNumber`, ca.`carId` ,dc.`carBrandName` as dccarbrandname , deb.`engineBrandName` as debenginebrandname , cc.`name` as ccname ,ca.`carer`, cc.`phone` as ccphone ,ca.`mileage`, cc.`number` as ccnumber ,deb.`id` as debid , dc.`id` as dcid FROM `client_carinfo` AS ca STRAIGHT_JOIN `client_clientdata` AS cc ON ca.`clientId` = cc.`number` STRAIGHT_JOIN `data_engine_brand` AS deb ON ca.`engineId` = deb.`id` STRAIGHT_JOIN `data_carbrand` AS dc ON ca.`carBrandId` = dc.`carBrandName` WHERE ca.`carNumber` = #{carnumber}
mapper.sql: id, clientId, carNumber, carBrandId, carId, carer, carerPhone, bornDate, affiliation, drivingLicence, frameNumber, engineNumber, yearPrice, mileage, engineId, carrying, buyDate, dutyDate, carcheckDate, fuelOilType, carSeries, jqinsurance, jqinsuranceDate, syinsurance, syinsuranceDate, maintain, maintainDate, default1, default2
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from client_carinfo
order by ${orderByClause}
